EmailTemplate.description: Subject line A: Ready to upgrade your self-service channel? Subject line B: Where are you with your self-service strategy? https://www.ncr.com/banking/atm-self-service/cash-recycling-atms https://www.ncr.com/banking/atm-self-service/cash-recycling-atms?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=2021_May_60Series_Banking&utm_content=Email10&utm_industry=banking&utm_sub-industry=
EmailTemplate.name: 04-20-22 BNK 62/64 Campaign Email 10.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Ready to upgrade your self-service channel?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Consumers are increasingly comfortable using the self-service channel for day-to-day transactions. But that means they also expect higher-level functionality and ease of use from your tech. They want: - Digital-first interactions - Contactless and cardless authentication - Sense of privacy and security - A UI that reflects their smartphone and tablet. So, your ATM strategy needs to keep up — to meet these demands and those of your business. Look no further. NCR’s latest SelfServTM 60 Series does it all. A revolutionary new ATM design that will wow consumers and deliver exceptional digital-first experiences alongside reduced energy consumption, greater note capacities and optimized cash ecosystems for cost savings. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
